meanings.definition: Having a texture that requires more chewing than usual.
meanings.sent1: The steak was chewier than expected.
meanings.sent2: The gum became chewier as I kept chewing.
meanings.sent3: I tried to eat the chewier candy, but it took forever!
meanings.sent4: The tough bread was even chewier than a rubber band.
meanings.sent5: The taffy was so chewier that it felt like chewing on a tire.

meanings.sent1: This cookie is chewier than the last one.
meanings.sent2: The brownies are getting chewier as they cool down.
meanings.sent3: I can't decide which is chewier, the pizza or the pasta.
meanings.sent4: The older the candy gets, the chewier it becomes.
meanings.sent5: The fresh bread was much chewier than the stale one.
